entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Broken Build]: Linux build with ipv6 connectivity #95228
  • JIT: Incorrect removal of bounds check in some loop structures #95226
    9.0.0
  • Publishing for linux-bionix-x64 using NativeAOT fails #95223
  • System.Net.HttpListener.Tests failure: Expected _associatedHttp11ConnectionCount=0 > _availableHttp11Connections.Count=0 #95220

Closed

  • Make typeof(T).GUID an intrinsic on NAOT where possible (like .NET Native) #95184
  • [API Proposal]: DateTime.AddMonths() should have similar argument naming as other similar methods. #95222
  • Build failure on runtime-community after #94590 #95113
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix invalid parameters in SetFileInformationByHandle #95235
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize "implied relops" in assertprop #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • The problem with memory cache threads has been fixed #95230
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [PERF] DaysInMonth optimization #95229
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • JIT: Disallow loop increments in the top block #95227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve `.Distinct().ToList()` and `.Union(e).ToList()` #95224
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Remove dependency of RuntimeType.GUID on universal custom attribute reader #95212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Enable division optimization for s390x #95201
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix build of host tests for s390x / ppc64 / armv6 #95145
    area-Host

Updated

  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip EH table for inlinees in fgDfsReversePostorder #95200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Created

  • Rewrite `install-llvm.ps1` to be usable locally #2441

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nov 23 #2419
  • Add Native AOT for Android experiment #2439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Assembly InformationalVersion now includes GUID suffix #37142

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\8.0.0-preview.6.23307.4\msi.json' is denied." when installing workload using another account. #33198

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Bug] Primary constructor doesn not hadle structural equality for struct Equals() #70963

Updated

  • The default parameter value for struct and record struct is ignored when a new instance is created #70892
  • Dynamic compound assignment doesn't take receiver by reference #70956
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Merged

  • Decrease allocations in ObjectReaderTextReader.Create. #70950
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HeadContent with prerender=false doesn't work #52368
  • .NET8 Not respecting @layout #52367
  • Remove Newtonsoft.Json dependency from JsonPatch #52366
  • How to remove ActionId and ActionName from log messages? #52361
  • .NET 8 Blazor SSR - Multiple Forms On Page - Field Binding #52360

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plaintext, updates #52363
  • Blazor wasm PWA install button (for IOS / Android web app on home screen) #51985
  • Program.cs is not called in Blazor Web App Client project (RC2) #51986
  • In Blazor Web App, getting console message about class added to Servi #51994
  • Implement JavaScript click event functions for easy use in Blazor #52349
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #52345
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #52338
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextSansFilter #52337
  • Perf regression: mvc #52358
  • "An item with the same key has already been added." in Blazor Webasm #37825
    Planning: WebUI
  • `dotnet new blazor` should be an alias for creating a Blazor Server template #43832
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Updated

  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Blazor project template #52234
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When a FCM notification is received, the application activates the "App Class" even when the application is closed #19030
  • Pinch And Pan Gesture not Working Properly #19028
  • Android App Fails in Release Build on Android 14 #19027
  • MAUI ios app not working/crashing after deployed to Testflight #19026
  • Target Platform Android is not visible #19025
  • Target Android Framework Not Settable Via UI #19024

Closed

  • App size is too large in Release mode with several native binded libraries #19019
  • The MAUI team does not respond to issues with any urgency... THIS IS **THE** ISSUE!!! #19018

PullRequests

Updated

  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Issues

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
